story:
Once upon a time in the vast savannah of Kenya, there lived a young lion cub named Kito. Kito was adventurous and curious, always eager to explore the wonders of his homeland.

One evening, as the golden sun dipped below the horizon, Kito lay next to his father under the sparkling blanket of the night sky. His father began to tell him a bedtime story...

"Long ago, in the heart of the Masai Mara, there was a wise old elephant named Tembo. Tembo was known for his gentle spirit and his remarkable memory. He had witnessed many seasons come and go, and his wisdom was sought by all creatures of the savannah.

One day, a great drought struck the land, drying up the once abundant watering holes and leaving the animals in despair. Tembo knew he had to help his fellow animals, so he embarked on a journey to find a hidden oasis, a place of nourishment and hope.

Through winding paths and towering trees, Tembo led the animals to the oasis, a shimmering pool of cool, clear water surrounded by lush greenery. The animals rejoiced and drank deeply, grateful for Tembo's courage and guidance.

From that day on, Tembo became a legend in the savannah, revered for his selflessness and wisdom. And so, the animals lived in harmony and peace, their spirits forever touched by the kindness of the wise old elephant."

As Kito's father finished the story, a gentle breeze rustled through the grass, carrying the whispers of the night. Kito closed his eyes, feeling safe and loved in his father's presence, dreaming of adventures yet to come in the magical land of Kenya.

And so, under the watchful gaze of the twinkling stars above, the lion cub drifted off to sleep, his heart filled with the wonder and beauty of his homeland.

The end. Goodnight, my little one. Dream sweet dreams of the wild and wonderful savannah of Kenya."
